website_summaries.verdict: The Sanctuary is ideal for cruising neighborhoods and city streets, not for off-road or challenging race courses. Some professional adjustments may be necessary for maximum benefit, but adult riders should have no problems riding this old-school cruiser model.
pros: 7 gears available for changes in terrain
cons: Gears and derailleur have known design issues
Not ideal for heavier, taller riders

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this bike
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bike. My husband is a biker and put it together, tuned it and I believe all the reviews that call this bike bad in some way have to do with bad assembly. It his heavy, yes, but it feels extremely solid on the road and I am currently looking for accessories. It is awesome on the flat bike trails of Hilton Head, and sturdy enough to have my 6 year old just sit on the back and us ride together. Great value!!! And VERY pretty colors, very pleasing to the eye, comfortable seat and feels great and solid on a road with cars going by. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Silja

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mount
customer_reviews.text: The Bike was all it was advertised as. Rides well, although a bit heavier than I expected. Not the bikes fault, but at my age, at 81 years, I was looking for a lighter Bicycle. I’m not saying that I can’t ride it, just not as far as I would like. Not the bike’s problem. I was seduced, by it’s good looks. My neighbors are also taken in by them. Oh, to be in my seventies again. Lol I will just enjoy shorter trips,
customer_reviews.author: John Bisset

customer_reviews.title: shipment issues / but i love the bike , rear wheel warped / not bent - un rideable
customer_reviews.text: the rear wheel was warped not sure how the box wasnt damaged , the rear wheel rubs the brakes and no way to a fix except to replace the wheel , i havent been able to get in touch with Schwinn , i will keep trying . [ 2 months now ] NEST TIME ILL GO WITH GIANT , THEY HAVE A 3 SPEED BUT MUCH BETTER QUALITY the rear wheel is warped / out of the box - how do i get this resolved ? ; 5 may 2020 / frank 13 may - i still have no rear wheel replacement from schwinn because i didnt buy the bike directly from them
customer_reviews.author: frank sanders

customer_reviews.title: I t rides great and the gears shift easily
customer_reviews.text: well packaged, assembly was straight forward no surprises. I did have a little problem getting the brakes set up properly, not a problem with the bike, just I never had those kind of breaks before, last bike I worked on had bendix coaster breaks, I am 70. The book helped me through the set up. I t rides great and the gears shift easily.. Everyone who sees it loves it.
customer_reviews.author: wayne baldwin

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: gear blew out on a bike ride. wish i would have paid attention to some of the reviews
customer_reviews.author: mich

customer_reviews.title: Too many issues.
customer_reviews.text: The bike may be great, we wouldn't know. I ordered this bike for my wife and immediately had to return it because there were multiple broken products. Then we got the "new" one in the mail and my wife wasn't able to ride it because again, there were multiple issues. Finally, I took it into our local bike shop and they're having to replace the rear tire (an additional 39.99 on top of the tune-up charges.) Again, bike may ride well but it takes a lot to even get it on the road.
customer_reviews.author: BWP

customer_reviews.title: Bike arrived in great condition. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bike arrived in great condition. Easy to assemble, but as a suggestion to most riders, invest a small amount in taking it to a bike shop for tweaking the gears and brake adjustment after assembling. Well worth the $40. I spent and turns a good bike buy into a great bike buy. I am an occasional weekend rider and didn't want to invest a huge amount of money, but wanted a sharp looking and descent quality ride. This bike does just that.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. both looks and ride
customer_reviews.text: I paid the extra money to have it put together here at my home, and that was easily the best part. This bike is pretty and fun and easy to ride. It's comfortable and I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaWr

customer_reviews.title: Broken derailleur main axis
customer_reviews.text: The bike came with the known issue others have reported. Derailleur doesn't work as you go down to 5th, 6th and 7th gear. You'll end up spinning in place until it kicks backs again. Also, main axis has a similar problem where every cycle you get a gap where motion is not transferring to the gears. We waited for 4 weeks for the bike and now it has to go back. I would not recommend this product to anyone. Too many people are ending up with problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bogdanoski

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: After having a few issues with the bike, I have to say that I have been able to finish assembling my replacement bike and was able to ride it for about one hour today. I found a bit of noise when pedaling, however, I was able to correct it by adjusting the cover for the chain in a few places to allow total clearance to the arm of the right pedal. It is a very good looking bike and it rode great. It is so far worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Bent rear wheel - otherwise perfect !
customer_reviews.text: Love these bikes but this one arrived with a bent rear wheel that is unfixable. The men’s version is great - granted you will likely need to take this to a local bike shop to have the brakes adjusted. If the supplier could send a replacement rear wheel that would solve the problem. Everything else arrived packaged nicely so nothing got damaged. Small ding on the crossbar for which I’d love a little cream touch up paint.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Didday

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The bike is beautiful. My first ride down the street I had people literally yelling how much they liked it. My husband put it together for me in 3 hours mind you this was his first time putting together a bike so someone who has more experience it would take less time. I have an old Schwinn so this shiny red one is the perfect upgrade. Only negative I have it that the red is not as pictured. It is a bright red. I still love it, but be warned if you’re looking for this dark red color pictured- it is not what you will get.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: A good bike after we got a better seat (Selle royal)
customer_reviews.text: Converted to electric. A good bike after we got a better seat (Selle royal), a new Weinman DM 30 rear wheel, a new Shimano 14-28 7 speed freewheel, both tires (Bontrager H2 26x2 hard case) and tubes, replaced the very flimsy rear rack with a Bontrager rack. Added a center stand. Added a 1000 watt front hub motor. DIY 6p 13s, 21 AH battery. Top speed is 30 mph, range 50 miles but its rare if we go more than 30 mi. If you get the wheels trued up properly the rim brakes work very good.
customer_reviews.author: David Perkins

customer_reviews.title: This bike is amazing I have had it for a few months no ...
customer_reviews.text: This bike is amazing I have had it for a few months no flat tires, there was no damage to bike upon delivery like some reviews say incredibly easy to assemble I did it myself!! it is a beautiful bike I have gotten several complements I highly suggest this bike it's a smooth comfortable ride and not bad to look at😊
customer_reviews.author: Jim Agee

customer_reviews.title: OK overall
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was fairly easy, considering I had never gotten a bike in the box before. Left side end of the front fork was bent but not too much that I wasn't able to bend it back. Gear adjustment was almost perfect, except there is no shifting into first .and the nib came off the front brake cable.
customer_reviews.author: Jim.

customer_reviews.title: Classic meets modern
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. It has a classic look and the bright red is very eye-catching. The seven speeds make it very fast and the comfort seat makes long rides enjoyable, which is great because I typically ride about 30-40 miles per trip. The luggage rack is an additional bonus. I customized by adding a bell, cup holder, and a bag and it is absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Denice

customer_reviews.title: Professional adjustments required before using
customer_reviews.text: The bike has a great look, BUT, it requires adjustments that account for at least 50% of the list price. Particularly, adjustments of shifts and breaks are absolutely required. As a result, we used the bike and rolled for 3 to 4 rides until the chain went out of the gears resulting in complete loss of the shifts/gear system. Now the repairs account for $120 which is near the price a paid for this bike. With this personal experience, it is impossible to recommend this brand or shipping method. Always consider bringing shipped bikes to a professional before use (and include the cost of this service before making a purchase decision).
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Angel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Stylish and retro look! Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful beach cruiser. Compliments every where I take it. Came packaged very well! Assembly was easy and you just need ordinary hand tools with #5 and #6 metric Allen wrench. Had one chip in the paint on the right front cross member? Shifts great right out of the box and the ride is smooth and flows evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Morris

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This bike is very pretty, but it is soo heavy. I followed every single step on the manual, but the front fender it is still loose. Don’t know why but as side of that it rides good. *** update*** On my first ride out, the derailleur broke. Had to get it replaced. It cost $60.00!!
customer_reviews.author: Yamely Frias

customer_reviews.title: beautiful bike. Came very well packaged as to ensure ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: beautiful bike. Came very well packaged as to ensure no dents or scratches. Cons: Bike arrived with brakes on backwards. It was missing assembly hardware. Gears quit adjusting after riding just four blocks. My friends work at a bike shop and spent two hours today trying to fix the gears. They can't get the bike to ride smooth so I may be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Cara C

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL but tire went flat
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVED my bike. However, that front tire already had to be replaced. Went flat in a week of having it. So we already had to replace the front bike tube!. Just check the tubes and make sure they are not dry rotted, busted, or anything
customer_reviews.author: Joshalyn

customer_reviews.title: Defective wheel
customer_reviews.text: I received a defective back wheel with this purchase. I got 3 flat tires in less than 6 bike rides, locally in city streets. I even bought the slime intertubes to find out where it's going flat... it's the spokes. Now I have to buy a new wheel. Be cautious with this!
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: Has lasted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike 5 years ago for $195 and it's now going for $500+ from other sellers. I almost bought a new bike, but took it to the bike shop to get it fixed up and back in rideable condition and it was the best decision I made in a while. Such a great bike and saved myself hundreds of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Had to return due to damage.
customer_reviews.text: The Seller was extremely quick at processing the return. Cannot give them enough credit. Bike was bright red and very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David Makima

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, terrible bike.
customer_reviews.text: This bike is absolute trash, 10/10 would not recommend. Within the first week of riding the bike completely fell apart. The metal scraped my legs and arms. The seat is extremely uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vintage Schwinn!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike! My great uncle had one like this when I was a kid and I got to ride his. So happy to have one again. The photos in the listing are gorgeous but they don't do justice to how beautiful it looks in person! I added King of Ding II Coming in Hot bell, vintage bullet headlight, and Wald quick release basket. Professional assembly and tune up are highly recommended, along with a more comfortable saddle. The one it comes with has minimal padding.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald M. Houze

customer_reviews.title: Damaged beyond repair
customer_reviews.text: To be fair to the product, we never got to use it. The bike arrived severely damaged. We tried to assemble it thinking we would just try to straighten the bent fender and carrier brackets, but then found that the rear wheel would not turn because the frame was bent so that the derailleur mechanism was pushed into the wheel spokes. Wanted the bike, but had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight W. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: If you're considering getting the bike don't. I bought this bike so I could get around my college campus easy but its a very cheaply made bike. The front fender rubs against my wheel because both sides that attach to the bike are different lengths and it makes the most annoying sound. I ended up just taking my front fender off the bike completely. All around Schwinn didn't assemble the parts well. It says "Schwinn Quality" on the bike but there is none to be seen. Save the money and buy something better. I barely got the bike and it already has issues.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bike, certainly worth the price. Needed a little tweaking but not a problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey batakis

customer_reviews.title: This bike WILL disappoint you!
customer_reviews.text: I thought Schwinn had a good reputation for quality products, but this bike is far from being a quality product. Shifting cables fraying ... hard to adjust the breaks due to the odd design of them. Worst part, the chain deraileur broke apart on me as I was riding with my grandchildren. It locked up my back wheel because it was caught in my spokes and I had to walk carrying the back wheel up off the ground 1 mile uphill to get it home. I am so disappointed in my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Memaw

customer_reviews.title: Live the look
customer_reviews.text: This bike was easy to put together even though the instructions aren't great. I took it to a bike shop to confirm I did it correctly and make sure the brakes were right - they were not evenly spaced on either side of the front tire. Turns out the front fork that holds the tire was bent in shipping and squed in manufacturing. Schwinn was nice about sending me a new one. Unfortunately that one was also squed. I am waiting to hear if the third fork is true and I can finally ride my birthday bike. It's very cute though.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dunagan

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: handle bar post was badly bent when it arrived, must husband has mad skills and was able to straighten it. BUT we bought the ladies bike too and the gears blew out on it.
customer_reviews.author: mich

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my little bicycle
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my little bicycle. I live on a small island where we only drive golf carts but I thought a bike would be a nice alternative. This bike is extremely easy to assemble but it did take a few minutes to get it all together. Once I did it was a breeze to use. It is so attractive as well and easy to ride. Very pleased with this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Teynarae

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. No messing with gears and minimal brake Adjustment required. Overall a good bike for the money.
customer_reviews.author: armylaw

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bike
customer_reviews.text: So easy to ride. Had the local bike shop assemble it because I didn’t want to. Highly recommend for casual, soulful rides around the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Craig W.

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the Buck..
customer_reviews.text: I am being generous with the stars in consideration of the ridiculously low price on this bike. It will need adjustment and tune up on arrival. Even adjusted, shift gears while standing at your own risk. Chain shifts off such that I avoid the edges of the cluster. This is after I had it tuned. But I wanted a beach cruiser that I wouldn't care if it was stolen, and for that, it's intended purpose, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I had the bike shop assemble it. The shop said it wasn’t easy. The bike looks great and is a breeze to ride. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bloomsburg

customer_reviews.title: getting the brakes aligned during assembly was difficult
customer_reviews.text: Great bike however getting the brakes aligned during assembly was difficult. Ended up taking it to a local bike shop for adjustment and overall tune up prior to riding first time. I absolutely love this bike!
customer_reviews.author: jenn_alder

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, sleek looking
customer_reviews.text: 1st bike was damaged. However return and reorder was easy. Had bike delivered to bike shop for professional assembly. I have enjoyed riding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and the delivery people were very nice. Container was intact and all pieces were inside as well as assembly instructions. I am not sure why some peoples delivery and experience were not as mine but this bike is exactly what it looks like. It is well made and very comfortable to ride. I am 5'3" (if I stretch, LOL) and getting on and off is very easy. Step through sit down and start peddling!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Green Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Quality Schwinn !
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Purchased this for my mother for Mother’s Day, she loved it! It was easy to assemble and was packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Early arrival
customer_reviews.text: Received ahead of schedule. Easily assembled. Used once already at Monterey bike path with no problems. Derailleur was well tuned and ready to go. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Donald B.

customer_reviews.title: Relax, ride, and enjoy your surroundings!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Arrived without a scratch and was not difficult to finish the assembly. It is very comfortable and affordable. I highly recommend this for someone who just wants to relax, ride and enjoy the environment.
customer_reviews.author: RWG

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the gf.
customer_reviews.text: Pros- 1. low seat post so one can get on and off easily. 2. comfortable seat. 3. the gears come tuned so no tinkering was required. 4. comfortable riding position. 5. Brakes are amazing. (no tuning required out of the box) Cons - 1. HEAVY bike (40-45lbs) taking off the fenders and the carrier makes a big difference. 2. 26" tires wish it was a 300c sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Prem

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived in excellent shape and the assembly was not too challenging. It was missing a part for the front brake. Their customer support was very helpful and promised to send out the part ASAP. It's been a week and part hasn't yet arrived, but I trust it will very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Drup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: pieces contained well and easy to put together. I love the wide seat. I would buy again. I loved mine so much I bought second one for daughter. Finally delivered it to her when we went to visit her (she lives 1k miles away). Hubby put it together like he did mine but it doesn't work right. Daughter has to take it to bike shop to see what is wrong. I will update when she does.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: what a great bike! absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: what a great bike! absolutely love it! defiantly got more than i expected with this bike. the installation was not too bad but would strongly recommend to get the breaks aligned with a bike shop. i went to a bike project shop and worked on it with someone that works there. cost me $8 in total. don't think twice this bike is legendary!
customer_reviews.author: eliad

customer_reviews.title: Love My Schwinn.....but no banana seat.  LOL
customer_reviews.text: Building is easy enough. Love this bike and have enjoyed riding it on many outings. The seat has the old time feel with the springs. Too bad the old Banana Seat isn't available for this bike. LOL
customer_reviews.author: David L. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it, you won’t regret, rides very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: We got the red one and it looks fabulous, received many compliments when riding it, very easy to assemble and rides very very smooth, the seat is very comfortable too, I’m 39 and this bike is awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Evandro

customer_reviews.title: Derailleur is of very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately you pay for what you get with this bike. It's a cute cruiser that my wife loved but after a month and about 6 rides around the neighborhood the derailleur somehow got caught in the spokes and twisted to the point where it is unfixable. Of course this occurred one day after the return window for this bike or I would be asking for an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good built and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a great and sturdy bike. I gave it a 4* because: 1. it was uneasy to assemble 2. had some bents and little scratches 3. the seat itself is super uncomfortable, so I had to order a different seat itself
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bike!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Crusier for riding with the family around the neighborhood!!!! I have received many compliments on the appearance of this bike!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't use the top or lowest gear, the chain will slip.
customer_reviews.text: Step through frame is easy to mount and dismount, but awkward to brace with legs when stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Henry J. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Low quality. Product was very damaged upon arrival. I would not expect this product to last with regular use. Also missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made and Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Shame on Schwinn! ! Cute but cheaply made. Way overpriced for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Always Looking

customer_reviews.title: ... was old and had 4 big holes bike was dirty and paint had two chips and back fender had ...
customer_reviews.text: The box was old and had 4 big holes bike was dirty and paint had two chips and back fender had scratches. looked as if they just dropped the bike in an old box put a couple of pieces of tape on it. But it did go together easily had to get derailer adjusted didn't go through gears properly. My wife loves it she is 4ft 11 in and it fits her great. Be careful if you buy it box maybe damaged and the bike also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not bie agen
customer_reviews.text: Bike came damaged front fender dented..large scraches on frame wife took out tryed to shift gears and it broke bending rear fender arm ...not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bike
customer_reviews.text: Is all reviews about people saying that you had to put it together and get the gears on track or the chain on track and it's slipping into the tire and just completely ruining it I've had none of those problems I had to put the tires on and the handlebars on but that wasn't too bad the chain was already on and I got right on And rode and it works wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Fair quality with damaged fender
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions are poorly written and not specific for this bike. I recommend going to their website where they have a video of how to do it. I tried to adjust the brakes but I'll probably bring the bike to a shop for a professional check. The front fender arrived bent and I'll need to contact the vendor today to understand their replacement policy. The bike had also some paint dents but lets be honest, after a couple of months on the road that will happen anyway.
customer_reviews.author: LatinAsian

customer_reviews.title: Super classy.  Super classic
customer_reviews.text: A super-classy, classic bike. It looks beautiful and rides really smooth.
customer_reviews.author: AllThingsTech

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted in a bicycle.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike, fairly straightforward assembly. I'm still working on eliminating the brake squeal and being 68 and a little on the large side I purchased a wider more comfortable seat. Overall very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size ,the color, and the style. The only thing that happened was the back fender had a couple of smal dents which looked like it happened because of the way it was packed. It interfered with tire. We had to pull it away from the tire
customer_reviews.author: DGracie

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are a joke. Nothing easy about assembly. Definitely need 2 people for portions for the assembly. The front breaks are too tight to install the front wheel..
customer_reviews.author: Pinal H. Patel

customer_reviews.title: A decent value.
customer_reviews.text: My wife liked the look but I thought it could have been a stronger bike. It works, but everything on it bends or goes out of adjustment easily. You get what you pay for on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well.... tire tube old and wont hold air
customer_reviews.text: the bike came when expected and was packaged well.. no dent or scratches in transit. Fairly easy to put together... however front tire was flat and will not hold air. Would like to get a free replacement, just not sure how to contact manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It came in good condition, assembly was easy
customer_reviews.text: My Husband got this bike for riding to work and recreation. It came in good condition, assembly was easy. adjustments take a little time but are straight forward. Can easily see the quality is not what Schwinn bikes use to be but over all is decent. Have had no problems with the bike since received and assembled. Ride and handling are good.
customer_reviews.author: Gay Ames

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied and my wife loves the bike
customer_reviews.text: Bike came with Chipped paint, received money off from amazon which was a surprise. Need the purple paint and when I contacted Schwinn, said they do not stock the paint or touch up paint.Overall satisfied and my wife loves the bike. It is very beautiful despite the chips.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Damaged/defective
customer_reviews.text: No valid response to how I can get this replaced. Realized after assembling the bike, I see the cargo rack was bent down like this. Nothing on the box indicating damage to the bike either which is odd. I would like to get just the rack replaced at least and a representative contact me regarding this. Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome... but
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this bike, but had to bring to repair shop before could be ridden to fix gears.
customer_reviews.author: dori

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Fun Bike
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike. I wanted a bike like the one’s that were around when I was a kid some 41 years ago. It is a little difficult to put together right out of the box, but if you are handy you will be able to do it. It is a great fit for a 6 ft. man and smaller. Love this bike. It is very decorative and the colors, copper and cream, are retro.
customer_reviews.author: Neville Poindexter, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: attractive and very sharp
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble. Nice bike for price. Not a 'Pro' bike but fine for local cruising.
customer_reviews.author: TexasGuy

customer_reviews.title: ZERO REGRETS. FIVE STARS.
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments everywhere I go. Great looking bike. Sturdy frame. Decent derailleur. I intend to hold on to this bike for a while. I will be slowly upgrading side parts here and there. Added a basket to rear. Intend to upgrade brakes. Derailleur. Pedals. Etc.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Carty

customer_reviews.title: Cut on seat
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the bike but the only issue is the seat came with a cut on front as the picture shows. The seat was well protected with paper and plastic. I dont get how come that happened
customer_reviews.author: Josemab

customer_reviews.title: Not an easy ride
customer_reviews.text: So I love the way this bike looks and feels sitting on it. However, it’s soooo hard to ride. I feel like I’m pulling a boulder behind me. I’m pretty upset because I’ve had it for a month and can barely ride it. The gears don’t change smoothly either.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle benisatto

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. Great bike for the money. Love the color, easy to assemble. Looking forward to riding with better weather on the way.
customer_reviews.author: reba

customer_reviews.title: Schwinn Ladies Sanctuary Cruiser
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Awesome Schwinn Classic Paint Scheme and great value for the dollar and Christmas gift too...
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike - really sharp looking with the copper and ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike - really sharp looking with the copper and cream paint job. The front fender was dented during shipping but not that bad. Rear tire went flat after two rides and had to be replaced with a heavy duty one and I only weigh 180. The gearing is way too high and you have to be going down hill to even use second gear but for $200 I'm OK with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: BEN

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike- be weary about buying bikes on amazon that are not assembled
customer_reviews.author: Angela Deters

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it cost $2000 not under $200
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous bike! Looks like super expensive vintage model. Putting it together was doable but not super, super easy. However, well worth it in the end!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and feels solid
customer_reviews.text: Bike works perfectly. It looks nice and feels solid. Assembly was easy, take the time to adjust the derail-er and set the limits or it could easily jam in the spokes.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bike that's even prettier in person than on-line! The colors are terrific and our daughter was very pleasantly surprised with it! She rode it on Christmas day and didn't want to stop. The bike is not just stylish, it's well-built and worth the cost. She will enjoy it for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Goette

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for price
customer_reviews.text: Bike was a gift. Recipient loved it however the chain keeps slipping off and some other minor problems. Going to take to a bike shop and see if they can fix problems.
customer_reviews.author: naskar24

customer_reviews.title: We like the bike
customer_reviews.text: We like the bike. Had a problem with back wheel going flat. They replaced the entire bike. Same thing happened again. Now we have a new back wheel only. Just received. Have tried it out yet. But. We like the bike. And have had no problem with returns.
customer_reviews.author: Dreama Smith

customer_reviews.title: Got to take a short ride (it's -3 degrees in Columbus Ohio) shifter was working great same with brakes
customer_reviews.text: Bike purchased for me by my wife , arrived in a timely manor. All complete no parts missing, although the rear carrier was bent downward at the end. The metal was thin enough to straighten with bare hands. Anyway very little assembly was required seat ,handlebars front wheel and fender. Got to take a short ride (it's -3 degrees in Columbus Ohio) shifter was working great same with brakes ,no adjustment required. A good buy....can't wait to hit the bike path when the weather breaks, until then I'll just admire it's cool retro style.... DW
customer_reviews.author: Margaret West

customer_reviews.title: arived on time.
customer_reviews.text: Good Schwinn fore the money, easy to assemble I bought two during the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: mac man

customer_reviews.title: GOOD CONDITION
customer_reviews.text: CAME IN PERFECT SHAPE AND PACKAGING. FIGURE THE BUYERS THAT COMPLAINED HAD NO MECHANICAL EXPERIENCE. HAD TO ADJUST BRAKES AND ADJUSTMENT MECHANISAMS AND BRAKE SHOE TO THE RIM NOT VERY ACCURATE LOW SPEED NOT LOW ENOUGH ON A HILL. MUST BE GEARED FOR SPEED AND NOT EASE OF RIDING ON HILLY TERRAIN.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD A. HALL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: There are some scratches on the frame that I am concerned will rust since I live in a moist and wet area. Also was very disappointed it was not made in the USA, I really wanted a bike made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine MacIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Just a word of caution
customer_reviews.text: The bike is just ok. I couldn't get the rerailer to put the chain into the correct gear. Finally had to take it to a bike shop, which I would recommend for any purchaser, to ensure that the wheels ride straight and that the brakes and gears are working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Everything else looks good. Likely just a bad QC check on this ...
customer_reviews.text: Derailer was a mess upon unboxing, and on the first ride, the rear tube burst. When I took it apart, there was a half split seam on the tube. Everything else looks good. Likely just a bad QC check on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective Inner Tubes
customer_reviews.text: The frame itself is fine, but the inner tubes sent with it were defective. I had to replace the front tube after only two days of riding and the back one a day after that! If you do buy this product, I strongly suggest replacing the tubes before you ride or you'll end up stranded halfway home like I was.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie Valverde

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: First shipment the forks were bent...easy return process but still had to Wait for the bike again,d hence the 2 star review...and second shipment the gear busted after one use! Will take bike to shop to fix but won't ever buy again! Disappointed in Schwinn for second bike and disappointed in Amazon for shipping damage of first bike!
customer_reviews.author: krash0809

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike. I put it together all by myself. The instructions are not very good so it helps to know a little about bikes. The color is a wonderful shade of purple. I did buy a new seat before I ever used the one that came with because they are never comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t tell you
customer_reviews.text: Missing a bunch of bolts. Look is nice but a little ridiculous to have to go to the hardware store because they left parts out.
customer_reviews.author: James and Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Love my new bike
customer_reviews.text: I had to get someone to put it together but its a great bike I am a large woman and this bike is easy to ride!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good Bike, Great Reward
customer_reviews.text: The only real problem that was had with the bike is that the box came extraordinarily damaged which caused some concern and there was a small dent on the front fender located in-between where the frame and fender almost touched. Besides that my friend who I bought it for enjoys it greatly and I'm impressed by the bike's performance. Plus it's made her butt look great so thanks for that Schwinn, you ma man.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Braden

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: My wife does not ride but a couple times a year. Her wrist usually hurt while riding. This bike is perfect for casual rider with comfy seat and handle bars well placed. Shifts easily. If you are looking for tough off road this is Not the bike for you. Tires are a nice cross type allowing for good traction in hard dirt but smooth on asphalt
customer_reviews.author: Skippy12

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike for a nice price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bike, it is comfortable to ride and looks like I spent a lot more on it that I did. It is a bit heavy but for beach cruising it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy J Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, needs professional assembly
customer_reviews.text: Hard to tune the bicycle, loosen one part, tighten another, rear fender still isn't centered to the back tire. Very frustrating, but I finally got it close enough... Putting a child carrier on the back was also frustrating, but worked with some minor adjustments to the child carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nobles

customer_reviews.title: We have had the bike almost three years, and ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had the bike almost three years, and everyone loves it. No malfunctions, a pleasure to ride, and the retro style grabs lots of attention. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E Lide

customer_reviews.title: Just put the bike together is very nice except there is a big dent on the back ...
customer_reviews.text: Just put the bike together is very nice except there is a big dent on the back of the front fender. It was a gift so I hope they will replace it, without sending the whole bike back. Was easy to assemble it. Other than the dent am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Casper

product_meta.title: Schwinn Sanctuary 7 Cruiser Bike, Featuring Retro-Styled 16-Inch/Small Step-Through and 18-Inch/Medium Step-Over Steel Frames, 7-Speed Drivetrain, Front and Rear Fenders, Rear Rack, and 26-Inch Wheels
product_meta.description: Founded in 1895, Schwinn is an American icon, building some of the best-known and best-loved bicycles of all time. From its very beginning in Chicago, Illinois, the Schwinn mission has been to develop bicycles that allow people to experience the confidence and freedom that comes from riding a bike. Ride through town in leisure with the Schwinn Sanctuary Cruiser Bicycle. This steel-framed cruiser bike offers all the comfort you need to enjoy your ride. Full fenders keep mud and dirt away from your clothing, while the rear cargo rack holds everything you need to carry along for the journey. A Shimano seven-speed rear derailleur with SRAM twist shifters offers all the performance you need. Aluminum alloy rims are lightweight and strong, while the padded cruiser saddle with springs leaves you in complete comfort. This bike ships ready to be assembled.
feature_bullets: Ride through town in leisure with the Schwinn Sanctuary 7 Comfort Cruiser Bicycle. This steel-framed cruiser bike offers all the comfort you need to enjoy your ride. Suggested rider height is 5'4"-6"2".
Full fenders keep mud and dirt away from your clothing, while the rear cargo rack holds everything you need to carry along for the journey.
A Shimano seven-speed rear derailleur with SRAM twist shifters offers all the performance you need.
Aluminum alloy rims are lightweight and strong, while the padded cruiser saddle with springs leaves you in complete comfort.
The Schwinn Sanctuary 7 cruiser bike ships ready to be assembled with a limited lifetime warranty and the wheels measure 26 inches.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
